body_html:
@trias702 Try if helps by changing the lines 147-149 of aten\src\ATen\CMakeLists.txt from

ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(OUTPUT ${generated_cpp}
COMMAND ${GEN_COMMAND}
DEPENDS ${all_python} ${all_templates} ${cwrap_files})

to

ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(OUTPUT ${generated_cpp}
COMMAND ${GEN_COMMAND}
DEPENDS ${all_python} ${all_templates} ${cwrap_files}
WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

Also you can try capture the command the path here by using the following commands:

MESSAGE("${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}")
MESSAGE("${GEN_COMMAND}")

And try executing the commands by hand to detect the issue.
